net.corda.node.services.identity

Class InMemoryIdentityService

  • SingletonSerializeAsToken
    • net.corda.node.services.identity.InMemoryIdentityService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityService, SerializeAsToken

    public class InMemoryIdentityService
extends SingletonSerializeAsToken
implements IdentityService

    Simple identity service which caches parties and provides functionality for efficient lookup.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.corda.core.node.services.IdentityService

        IdentityService.DefaultImpls

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Iterable<net.corda.core.crypto.Party> getAllIdentities()
      Get all identities known to the service. This is expensive, and InMemoryIdentityService.partyFromKey or partyFromName should be used in preference where possible.
      Party partyFromAnonymous(AnonymousParty party) 
      Party partyFromAnonymous(PartyAndReference partyRef)

    • Method Detail

      • registerIdentity

        public void registerIdentity(Party party)

      • getAllIdentities

        public java.lang.Iterable<net.corda.core.crypto.Party> getAllIdentities()

        Get all identities known to the service. This is expensive, and InMemoryIdentityService.partyFromKey or partyFromName should be used in preference where possible.

        See Also:
